Businesses with a significant delivery component should provide a Delivery Management Plan that demonstrates that waiting delivery drivers and their cycles can be accommodated off the pavement, and the pavement should only be used in exceptional circumstances where the pavement is particularly wide and has an exceptionally low level of pedestrian traffic. The Delivery Management Plan should also demonstrate the provision of welfare facilities for the delivery drivers, including toilets and rest areas.
